item.title: WATCH: Bride visits grandma at nursing home on wedding day since she can't attend
item.description: New bride Dinahlee Nava says her grandma is her hero!

item.title: Tom Homan says he will jail mayor for challenging Trump's deportation efforts
item.description: Homan’s comments come after Mayor Mike Johnston said he was willing to go to jail to stop possible mass deportation efforts under the incoming Trump a...

item.title: WATCH: Dog surprised with piñata full of tennis balls for birthday
item.description: Oscar, a 3-year-old golden retriever, was surprised with a handmade tennis ball-shaped piñata full of tennis balls for his birthday!

item.title: A potential Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire deal has emerged. Here's what to expect
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will convene his security cabinet on Tuesday afternoon to vote on the cease-fire deal.

item.title: WATCH: Adorable toddler meets Winnie the Pooh while dressed as the beloved character
item.description: The two shared a sweet hug at Disneyland Paris.
